.Valid Usage (Implicit)
****
* [[VUID-VkImageViewCreateInfo-sType-sType]] pname:sType must: be ename:VK_STRUCTURE_TYPE_IMAGE_VIEW_CREATE_INFO
* [[VUID-VkImageViewCreateInfo-pNext-pNext]] Each pname:pNext member of any structure (including this one) in the pname:pNext chain must: be either `NULL` or a pointer to a valid instance of slink:VkImageViewUsageCreateInfo or slink:VkSamplerYcbcrConversionInfo
* [[VUID-VkImageViewCreateInfo-sType-unique]] Each pname:sType member in the pname:pNext chain must: be unique
* [[VUID-VkImageViewCreateInfo-flags-zerobitmask]] pname:flags must: be `0`
* [[VUID-VkImageViewCreateInfo-image-parameter]] pname:image must: be a valid sname:VkImage handle
* [[VUID-VkImageViewCreateInfo-viewType-parameter]] pname:viewType must: be a valid elink:VkImageViewType value
* [[VUID-VkImageViewCreateInfo-format-parameter]] pname:format must: be a valid elink:VkFormat value
* [[VUID-VkImageViewCreateInfo-components-parameter]] pname:components must: be a valid sname:VkComponentMapping structure
